Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. It's not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe its true value exceeds $12000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $15000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your potential to fully utilize the product's capabilities. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution. Let's discuss how we can make this happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
